mema aluth niwasata nudurin ma sukara kotuwak thana thibune ya.mema kotuwa thana thibune kithul kadan walini.wal ali kithul kadan pala ehi badaya kamehi rusiyo ya.kithule iwa watunu hasthiyek dawasak da rathri mema kotuwata kittu kale ya.math, mage sewakayath niwasehi sitina wita eeta yabadawa pihiti sukara kotuwa aasannayen hasthayeku ge nadayak asini.mamath sewakayath hulu athu alwa gena ethanata diwa giyemu.ewita apita daknata labune kithul kadan kamehi aashawen sukara kotuwa bida winasha karamin siti dawantha hasthiyeki.eli dalwa gena apa kala ghoshawa hethu kota gena, kotuwa bidima ethekin nawathwa, mage niwasaya da eheyin ma bera, atha wanayata ma yannata giye ya.gini eliyata atha bhaya ya.gowiyan boho wita owunge gowipalawal wal alingen bera ganne wishala gini mala dalwa thabimeni.mema gurukama anuwa eda rathriye api gini malayak dalwa thabimi.eeta pasu aliya nopaminiye ya.
